title: What should I write in a hardship letter? - Quora

response.answer_text: The cause of the hardship.The difficulties the hardship is creating. For example, lack of food, housing or transportation.The medical condition(s) related to the hardship, if any.The amount of income loss from one month to another, or from one year to the next.The number of people in your household.Provide your name, address, contact phone # and date of letter. Send it to whom it may concern.
